extraDescription: IT Security TRA and C&A Analyst, PIA Specialist, Data Conversion Specialist, IM Architect, Change Management Consultant, Enterprise Architect, Project Executive, Project Coordinator, and Project Manager for the Financial Management Transformation (FMT) initiative to accelerate progress toward modernizing GC back office financial management operations.
comments: This contract was competitively sourced.This contract is a multi-year contract.For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
